mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipes (title, cuisine_id, image, description, ingredients, steps, user_id, status, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{cuisineId}, #{image}, #{description}, #{ingredients}, #{steps}, #{userId}, 0, NOW())
